gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.context
Interface ContextManagerClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVPanel, DefaultContextManagerClientPanel, HL7Panel, HSMPanel, MappingPanel
public interface ContextManagerClient

This interface defines a list contracts that a context manager expects any pluggable context to be implemented. A typical example of a ContextManagerClient is a panel that will be hosted by the MainFrame.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:02 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $
